mapper.insert: insert into sys_menu (id, name, icon, parent_id, url, remark, type) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update sys_menu set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, icon = #{icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, name, icon, parent_id, url, remark, type from sys_menu
